Accelerators,

First, a warm welcome to our new members! There are 29 of you this month. We cannot wait to work with you in accelerating psychological science.

We've made some really tremendous progress in June, and this newsletter (https://psysciacc.org/news/2020-06-29_news-from-the-accelerator-june-2020.html) provides updates on PSA personnel, our upcoming conference, all of our current studies, and more.
